releaseNotes:
v2.10 Update
Added a new pink butterfly and wings character.
Added a new 'Ribbon' butterfly body, and a ribbon on the Home screen, which change color to promote support for all awareness campaigns.
Various bug fixes and optimizations.
description:
The Elfenworks Foundation is proud to present this “Breathing Butterfly” app, created in collaboration with the teams at Tip-Tok and Elfenworks Productions, LLC.   The Breathing Butterfly is designed to help you relax and stress-down and tend to your inner butterfly garden. Soothing music combined with gentle animation promote calm, regular breathing as you cultivate inner peace. 
 
Simply taking a few deep breaths has been shown to reduce toxic cortisol levels, so we make it easy! The “breathing butterfly” at the heart of the app is offered in 28 different language and 330 different animation combination choices.   
 
Six tranquil games provide the user endless options for peaceful fun. Grow a garden and spot a hummingbird. Visit a cherry-blossom snow-globe. Guide a butterfly to sip blossom nectar and reach a rainbow. Make music. And yes, catch a falling star!
 
A timely app meant to help users to relax, breathe, and enjoy the moment.
 
###

About The Elfenworks Foundation  
The Elfenworks Foundation “In Harmony with Hope”® works to increase hope for a better future by equipping students, advancing our effective social entrepreneurship methodology, and fostering creative and technology solutions to some of our world's most pressing problems. You can use this app - and other tools - to help make a positive difference. As we say, “Never underestimate your ripple!”.   Find out more at www.elfenworksfoundation.org and get teacher tools and other Breathing Butterfly resources at www.elfenworksfoundation.org/butterfly.    
 
About Elfenworks Productions, LLC  
Elfenworks Productions, LLC is a multimedia production company specializing in positive storytelling with a pro-social vision. Whether soothing and nourishing the senses, exploring important untold stories, fostering learning, or helping redefine the landscape of possibilities, the common element is to inspire and uplift, "bringing light to what is right." Believing it is possible to do well while doing good, this creative, professional team of storytellers brings their expertise, integrity, intelligence and insight to bear on every effort, be it a film, a song, an app, an animation, or whatever’s next. Find out more at www.elfenworksproductions.com.
 
About Tip-Tok
Tip-Tok is a creative development studio comprised of a veteran team with over 20 years of experience putting together fun and visually entertaining mobile apps and desktop games, and offers complete game packaging, working with clients who have pre-existing brands and those who want to brainstorm and develop completely new and original concepts. Clients have included Elfenworks Productions, LLC, Warner Bros, Disney, Sprout, Nickelodeon, Paramount Studios, FOX kids, Busy Bee Studios, Mattel, and countless others. Find out more at www.tip-tok.com.
